GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
tipc: fix the timer expires after interval 100ms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 8d8cb4166a4705b9067087d459bf8369869782fa, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit 6787927475e52f6933e3affce365dabb2aa2fadf. For more details please see the references link.
